meanings: Noun 경비[감시/수비] 요원, 보초 (→warder, bodyguard, coastguard, lifeguard)
Noun 경호원단, 경비대 (→National Guard, old guard, rearguard)

The guard as it's called in grappling disiplines such as Brazilian Jiu jitsu or Sambo; is where one lies on his back holding his or her opponent's trunk with there legs. From this position it is possible to attack your opponent with joint locks, chokes,strikes or sweeps/reversals. It also is poss...
